titles: An argument for union taken from the true interest of those dissenters in England who profess and call themselves Protestants.
author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
publisher: Printed for Tho. Basset ..., Benj. Tooke ..., and F. Gardiner ...,
notes: Written By Thomas Tenison.  Cf. BM, Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
This work also appears, on reels 528:2 and 659:10, as the 11th item in v. 2 of: A collection of cases and other discourses / by some divines of the city of London.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  England --  Early works to 1800.
